channel.title: My ban or Kick In right click isnt working
channel.description: as title says. how do i get it working?

item.title: My ban or Kick In right click isnt working
item.dc:creator: @server_needer server needer
item.description:
@server_needer wrote:

this is very easy maybe the most easiest thing ive ever helped.

search for:

// highscores

you should see something like this

[code] case 3192: // highscores
if (playerRights == 0) {
StatsMenu();
} else if (playerRights == 1) {
int pIndex2 = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndian();
client p5 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[pIndex2];

            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Mod:" + " Player Kicked: "
                    + p5.playerName;
            PlayerHandler.kickNick = p5.playerName;
            BufferedWriter bw1 = null;

            try {
                bw1 = new BufferedWriter(
                        new FileWriter("logs/kicklogs.txt", true));
                bw1.write(playerName + " kicked " + p5.playerName);
                bw1.newLine();
                bw1.flush();
            } catch (IOException ioe) {
                ioe.printStackTrace();
            } finally {
                if (bw1 != null) {
                    try {
                        bw1.close();
                    } catch (IOException ioe2) {
                        sendMessage("Error logging kicks!");
                    }
                }
            }

            try {
                bw1 = new BufferedWriter(
                        new FileWriter(
                                "C:/Documents and Settings/Administrator/My Documents/Project Czar/Project Czar/logs/kicklogs.txt",
                                true));
                bw1.write(playerName + " kicked " + p5.playerName);
                bw1.newLine();
                bw1.flush();
            } catch (IOException ioe) {
                ioe.printStackTrace();
            } finally {
                if (bw1 != null) {
                    try {
                        bw1.close();
                    } catch (IOException ioe2) {
                        sendMessage("Error logging kicks!");
                    }
                }
            }
        } else if (playerRights >= 2) {
            int pIndex2 = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndian();
            client p5 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[pIndex2];

            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Admin:" + " Player Kicked: "
                    + p5.playerName;
            PlayerHandler.kickNick = p5.playerName;
        }

        break;[/code]

change the case to 39 like this.

case 39: // highscores

Read full topic

item.title: My ban or Kick In right click isnt working
item.dc:creator: @simply3 simply3
item.description:
@simply3 wrote:

homeyscape

here;s code

[code]if (playerRights <= 2) {
outStream.createFrameVarSize(104);
outStream.writeByteC(2); // command slot
outStream.writeByteA(0); // 0 or 1; 1 if command should be placed on top in context menu
outStream.writeString("@whi@F@gre@o@whi@l@gre@l@whi@o@gre@w");
outStream.endFrameVarSize();
} else if (playerRights >= 2) {
outStream.createFrameVarSize(104);
outStream.writeByteC(2); // command slot (does it matter which one?)
outStream.writeByteA(0); // 0 or 1; 0 if command should be placed on top in context menu
outStream.writeString("@whi@B@gre@a@whi@n");
outStream.endFrameVarSize();
}

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 03, 2009, 10:27:13 pm[/size][hr]bump
